text: ICN Business School is an European higher studies establishment. The school is in 4 places, in La Défense, Nancy, Berlin and Nuremberg. It has been established in 1905. ICN is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management.Triple couronne pour ICN avec l'accréditation AACSB ==References== == Further reading == * ICN website Category:Colleges and universities in France Category:Nancy Category:Organizations based in Berlin Category:Nuremberg
title: ICN Business School
